versionTitle: Rabbi Dr. David Mevorach Seidenberg, from "Kabbalah and Ecology"
title: Vayikra Rabbah
versionTitleInHebrew: רבי וד״ר דוד מבורך סיידנברג, מתוך ״קבלה ואקולוגיה״
text: ... And YHVH Elohim formed him dirt from the ground’—from the lower ones; ‘and He blew in his nostrils life’s breath / nishmat chayyim’ [Gn 2:7]—from the upper ones.
